q1: Where did your team finish in the World Cup Standings?
a1: the quarterfinals of the knockout stage
a2: Who did brazil play against in quarter finals?
q3: Brazil played against Belgium in the quarter finals and they have lost it 1-2.
a3: That was a big upset result
q4: Were they just too sure of themselves ?
a4: No. Unfortunately matches don't always go your way.
